How do I make a custom theme?

Glad ya' asked!
Here's the code for the main themes.

Dark Theme Light Theme Pure Black Theme

Here are the steps for ya'

  • Download that code.
  • Depending on your operating system, your custom theme folder is at.
    • Windows: ~/Appdata/Roaming/Noteted/themes
    • Linux: ~/.config/Noteted/themes
    • MacOS: ~/Library/Application Support/Noteted/themes
  • Drag and drop it to your custom theme's folder.
  • Edit it a little bit and then you're done!

Too lazy to make yourself?

You can use other user's custom themes!
Just go ahead and find it at Noteted Custom Github Repository
